ProcessDescription.ows:Title: TabulateArea_sa
ProcessDescription.ows:Abstract: Calculates cross-tabulated areas between two datasets. Uses ArcObjects library - Spatial Analyst

Input.ows:Title: in zone data
Input.ows:Abstract: The dataset that defines the zones. The zones can be defined as an integer raster layer or a feature layer.

Input.ows:Title: zone field
Input.ows:Abstract: The field that holds the values that define each zone. It can be an integer or a string field of the in_zone_data.

Input.ows:Title: in class data
Input.ows:Abstract: The dataset that defines the classes that will have their area summarized within each zone. The class input can be an integer raster layer or a feature layer.

Input.ows:Title: class field
Input.ows:Abstract: The field that holds the class values. It can be an integer or a string field of the in_class_data.

Input.ows:Title: processing cell size
Input.ows:Abstract: The processing cell size for the operation. This is the value in the environment if specifically set. If the environment is not set and in_zone_data is raster, the cell size is the same as in_zone_data. If the environment is not set and in_zone_data is feature, the cell size is the shorter of the width or height of the extent of in_zone_data in the output spatial reference, divided by 250.

Output.ows:Title: out table
Output.ows:Abstract: Output table that will contain the summary of the area of each class in each zone.
